isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - REMOVE - LOW SIDE PORT ADAPTER

svcproc.title: LOW SIDE PORT ADAPTER
svcproc.para: The low side port adapter remove procedures are in the following steps.

step1.para: Using a recycling machine, remove the refrigerant from the A/C system in accordance with the GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
Locate the suction side hose coming off the compressor and disconnect low side hose from low side port adapter on the compressor.
Remove the low side port adapter from between compressor and suction side hose.
